name: spo-get-contenttype-usage-listitem-listversion
title: Get Content Type usage within a site collection.
shortDescription: Get Content Type usage within a site collection.
longDescription: There is no out of the box way to get content type usage within a site collection. The scipt might help to identify usage with the intention to eventually delete the content type

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
